races.name: Elf
races.description: Graceful and long-lived, elves are known for their connection to magic and nature.

lineages.name: High Elf
lineages.description: Cultured and magical, High Elves have a natural affinity for arcane arts.

lineages.name: Wood Elf
lineages.description: Forest dwellers with keen senses and natural archery skills.

lineages.name: Drow
lineages.description: Dark elves from the Underdark, known for their cunning and shadow magic.

races.name: Human
races.description: Versatile and ambitious, humans are known for their adaptability.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Hardy and skilled craftspeople, dwarves are renowned for their resilience.
